news.title: Core inflation in February hits 2.8%, higher than expected; spending increases 0.4%
news.summary: The PCE price index was expected to increase 0.3% in February. Spending was projected to rise 0.5% in the same month.

news.title: CoreWeave prices IPO at $40 a share, below expected range
news.summary: CoreWeave is trying to thaw the tech IPO market with one of the biggest offerings in years. But investors have expressed some skepticism.

news.title: Russia's Putin says it would be a 'profound mistake' to dismiss Trump's push for Greenland
news.summary: Vladimir Putin says it would be foolish to dismiss U.S. President Donald Trump's push for control over Greenland. Putin: It would be a mistake to dismiss Trump's bid to take control of Greenland.

news.title: Nikola founder Trevor Milton says Trump pardoned him in securities fraud case
news.summary: Milton compared his prosecution by the Justice Department to its criminal cases against President Trump. He said he had been "railroaded" in the fraud case.

news.title: Trump's new auto tariffs will likely drive up car prices by thousands of dollars
news.summary: President Donald Trump announced the new auto duties one week before his sweeping "reciprocal tariff" plan is set to begin. The new duties are expected to take effect on July 1.
